parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Custom Radio and Chat </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the custom radio channel's call sign. 

Available special parameters:
* $KEY (reference to a localized text)
* %CHANNEL_LABEL
* %UNIT_SIDE
* %UNIT_NAME
* %UNIT_RANK
* %UNIT_ID
* %UNIT_REF
* %UNIT_GRP_NAME
* %UNIT_GRP_LEADER
* %UNIT_VEH_NAME
* %UNIT_VEH_POSITION </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> customChannelID [[radioChannelSetCallSign]] callSign </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> customChannelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]] returned by [[radioChannelCreate]] command </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> callSign: [[String]] - custom call sign </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>4 [[radioChannelSetCallSign]] "%UNIT_NAME";</code> </value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[radioChannelAdd]], [[radioChannelCreate]], [[radioChannelRemove]], [[radioChannelSetLabel]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
